# GitHub Workflows

Azure Static Web Apps workflow will be auto-generated when connecting this repository to Azure Static Web Apps.

## Expected Files

| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| `azure-static-web-apps-*.yml` | Auto-generated deployment workflow |

## Setup Steps

1. Create Azure Static Web App in Azure Portal
2. Link to this GitHub repository
3. Azure will auto-create the workflow file and push it here
